entries.name: Visió de Foscor
entries: Pots veure-hi en llum tènue a 60 peus d'abast com si fos llum forta i a la foscor com si fos llum tènue.

entries.name: Tarannà Mort
entries: You have escaped death, a fact represented by the following benefits:

items: Tens avantatge a saving throws against disease and being {@condition emmetzinat}, and tens resistència al dany poison.
Tens avantatge a death saving throws.
You don't need to eat, drink, or breathe.

You don't need to sleep, and you no pot ésser adormit màgicament. You can finish a long rest in 4 hours if you spend those hours in an inactive, motionless state, during which you retain consciousness.

entries.name: Knowledge from a Past Life
entries: You temporarily remember sporadic glimpses of the past, perhaps faded memories from ages ago or a previous life. When you make an ability check that uses a skill, you can roll a {@dice d6} and add the number rolled to the check. You can use this feature tants cops com el el teu bonus de competència, i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabes un Descans Llarg.

entries.name: Tamany
entries: El teu tamany és Mitjà o Petit. You choose the size when you gain this lineage.

entries.name: Llegat Ancestral
entries: Si reemplaces una raça amb aquest llegat, pots quedar-te, de la raça original: les competències d'habilitat; i qualsevol velocitat de caminar, de vol, d'escalada, o de natació.
Si tries aquest llegat des del principi o rebutges quedar-te cap element de la teva raça original, tens competència en dues habilitats que escullis.

entries.name: Tarannà Mort
entries: You have escaped death, a fact represented by the following benefits:

items: Tens avantatge a saving throws against disease and being {@condition emmetzinat}, and tens resistència al dany poison.
Tens avantatge a death saving throws.
You don't need to eat, drink, or breathe.

You don't need to sleep, and you no pot ésser adormit màgicament. You can finish a long rest in 4 hours if you spend those hours in an inactive, motionless state, during which you retain consciousness.

entries.name: Knowledge from a Past Life
entries: You temporarily remember glimpses of the past, perhaps faded memories from ages ago or a previous life. When you make an ability check that uses a skill, you can roll a {@dice d6} immediately after seeing the number on the {@dice d20} and add the number on the {@dice d6} to the check. You can use this feature tants cops com el el teu bonus de competència, i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabes un Descans Llarg.

entries.name: Revenant Subrace
entries: Having met a cruel and undeserved end, you have returned to the realm of the living. As a revenant, you thirst for revenge against those who wronged you in life, or seek to complete a final, critical task you left unfinished.

The revenant subrace can be applied to any race that has a subrace, and replaces that race's existing subrace options. Alternatively, you can apply this new subrace to a race without subrace options using the modification options provided below.

Your DM might also allow you to take this subrace for a slain character. In that case, your character rises from the dead with its original subrace replaced (or with the necessary modifications made to its base traits), filled with a determination to seek vengeance or complete its mission.

entries.name: Racial Adjustments
entries: For races that don't have subrace options, taking on the revenant subrace means making changes to your character's base traits, as follows. (This playtest article provides options only for human and dragonborn characters. Any other races which do not have subrace options should not be used with these revenant subrace rules.)

entries.name: Human Revenant
entries: If you want to play a human revenant, modify the human's Ability Score Increase trait to the following: Two different ability scores of your choice increase by 1. If you use the variant human traits, remove the Skills trait and the Feat trait.

entries.name: Dragonborn Revenant
entries: If you want to play a dragonborn revenant, modify the dragonborn's Ability Score Increase trait to the following: Your Força score increases by 1, and your Carisma score increases by 1. Additionally, your Ancestres Dracònics trait uses necròtic damage as its damage type, replacing the damage type that applies to your breath weapon and your damage resistance.

entries.name: Tiefling Revenant
entries: A prior installment of Unearthed Arcana (That Old Black Magic) outlined two tiefling variants that make use of subraces. Use that article to make a tiefling revenant, replacing the subrace options with the revenant subrace options. The base tiefling traits from the article are as follows:

items.name: Ability Score Increase.
items.entry: Your Carisma score increases by 2.

items.name: Languages.
items.entry: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Comú.

entries.name: Implacable Nature
entries: Your DM assigns a goal to you—typically, one related to your character's death. The goal must be a specific task you can complete, such as slaying an enemy or liberating an area and its people. Until you fulfill that goal, obténs els beneficis següents:

items: If you are below half your punts de vida màxims at the start of your turn, you regain 1 hit point.

If you die, you return to life 24 hours after death. If your body is destroyed, you reform within 1 mile of the place of your death at a spot determined by the DM. If your equipment was also destroyed, you do not regain it.

You know the distance and direction between you and any creature involved in your goal, such as a person you seek vengeance against or someone you pledged to defend. This awareness fails if the creature is on another plane of existence.

entries: When your goal is complete, you finally find rest. You die and cannot be restored to life.

entries.name: Edat
entries: Els Satyrs maduren i envelleixen si fa no fa com els humans.

entries.name: Alineament
entries: Satyrs delight in living a life free of the mantle of law. They gravitate toward being good, but some have devious streaks and enjoy causing dismay.

entries.name: Tamany
entries: Satyrs range from just under 5 feet to about 6 feet in height, with generally slender builds. El teu tamany és Mitjà.

entries.name: Fata
entries: El teu tipus de criatura és fata i no humanoide.

entries.name: Envestir
entries: You can use your head and horns to make atacs desarmats. Si impactes així, fas {@dice 1d4} + el teu modificador de Força de dany contundent.

entries.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Tens avantatge a saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Mirthful Leaps
entries: Whenever you make a long or high jump, you can roll a {@dice d8} and add the number rolled to the number of feet you cover, even when making a standing jump. This extra distance costs movement as normal.

entries.name: Reveler
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill Performance} and {@skill Persuasion} skills, and you have proficiency with one musical instrument of your choice.

entries.name: Idiomes
entries: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Comú i Silvà.

entries.name: Edat
entries: Shifters are quick to mature both physically and emotionally, reaching young adulthood at age 10. They rarely live to be more than 70 years old.

entries.name: Alineament
entries: Shifters tend toward neutrality, being more focused on survival than concepts of good and evil. A love of personal freedom can drive shifters toward chaotic alignments.

entries.name: Tamany
entries: El teu tamany és Mitjà.

entries.name: Velocitat
entries: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

entries.name: Visió de Foscor
entries: Tens una visió superior sota condicions de foscor o de poca llum. Pots veure-hi en llum tènue a 60 peus d'abast com si fos llum forta, i a la foscor com si fos llum tènue. No pots veure colors a la foscor, només blancs, negres, i grisos.

entries.name: Shifting
entries: Com a acció bonus, you can assume a more bestial appearance. This transformation lasts for 1 minute, until you die, or until you revert to your normal appearance as a bonus action. When you shift, you gain temporary hit points equivalent al teu nivell + el teu modificador de Constitució (minimum of 1 temporary hit point). You also gain additional benefits that depend on your shifter subrace, described below.
Once you shift, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

entries.name: Idiomes
entries: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Comú.

entries.name: Natural Athlete
entries: Tens competència en {@skill Athletics}.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: Whenever you shift, you gain {@dice 1d6} additional temporary hit points. While shifted, you have a +1 bonus to your Armor Class.

entries.name: Fierce
entries: Tens competència en {@skill Intimidation}.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifted, you can use your elongated fangs to make an atac desarmat as a bonus action. If you hit with your fangs, you can deal piercing damage equal to {@dice 1d6} + el teu modificador de Força, instead of the dany contundent normal for an atac desarmat.

entries.name: Graceful
entries: Tens competència en {@skill Acrobatics}.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifted, your walking speed increases by 10 feet. Additionally, you can move up to 10 feet as a reaction when a creature ends its turn within 5 feet of you. This reactive movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

entries.name: Natural Tracker
entries: Tens competència en {@skill Survival}.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifted, tens avantatge a Saviesa checks, and no creature within 30 feet of you can make an attack roll with advantage against you, unless you're {@condition incapacitat}.

entries.name: Tamany
entries: Shifters are about the same size as humans. El teu tamany és Mitjà

entries.name: Visió de Foscor
entries: Your lycanthropic heritage grants you the ability to see in dark conditions. Pots veure-hi en llum tènue a 60 peus d'abast com si fos llum forta, i a la foscor com si fos llum tènue. No pots veure colors a la foscor, només blancs, negres, i grisos.

entries.name: Shifting
entries: On your turn, you can shift as a bonus action. Shifting lasts for 1 minute or until you end it on your turn as a bonus action.
While shifting, you gain temporary hit points equivalent al teu nivell + your Constitució bonus (minimum of 1). You also gain a feature that depends on your shifter subrace, described below.
You must finish a short or long rest before you can shift again.

entries.name: Idiomes
entries: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Comú i Silvà.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifting, you gain a +1 bonus to AC.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifting, you gain a climb speed of 30 feet.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifting, you can use the {@action Dash} action as a bonus action.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifting, you can make a bite attack as an action. This is a atac armat cos a cos that uses Força for its attack roll and damage bonus and deals {@dice 1d6} de dany perforant. If this attack hits a target that is your size or smaller, the target is also {@condition grappled}.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifting, you can make an atac desarmat as a bonus action. You can use your Destresa for its attack roll and damage bonus, and this attack deals slashing damage.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifting, you gain advantage on all Saviesa-based checks and saving throws.

entries.name: Edat
entries: Shifters are quick to mature both physically and emotionally, reaching young adulthood at age 10. They rarely live to be more than 70 years old.

entries.name: Alineament
entries: Shifters tend toward neutrality, being more focused on survival than concepts of good and evil. A love of personal freedom can drive shifters toward chaotic alignments.

entries.name: Tamany
entries: Shifters range from 5 to almost 7 feet tall, depending on their subrace. El teu tamany és Mitjà.

entries.name: Visió de Foscor
entries: Tens una visió superior sota condicions de foscor o de poca llum. Pots veure-hi en llum tènue a 60 peus d'abast com si fos llum forta, i a la foscor com si fos llum tènue. No pots veure colors a la foscor, només blancs, negres, i grisos.

entries.name: Sentits Aguts
entries: Tens competència amb les armes {@skill Perception} skill.

entries.name: Shifting
entries: Com a acció bonus, you can assume a more bestial appearance. This transformation lasts for 1 minute, until you die, or until you revert to your normal appearance as a bonus action. When you shift, you gain temporary hit points equivalent al teu nivell + el teu modificador de Constitució (minimum of 1 temporary hit point). You also gain additional benefits that depend on your shifter subrace, described below.
Once you shift, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

entries.name: Idiomes
entries: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Comú.

entries.name: Tough
entries: Tens competència amb les armes {@skill Athletics} skill.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: Whenever you shift, you gain {@dice 1d6} additional temporary hit points, and while shifted, you have a +1 bonus to your AC.

entries.name: Fierce
entries: Tens competència amb les armes {@skill Intimidation} skill.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifted, you can use your elongated fangs to make an atac desarmat as a bonus action. If you hit with your fangs, you can deal piercing damage equal to {@dice 1d6} + el teu modificador de Força, instead of the dany contundent normal for an atac desarmat.

entries.name: Graceful
entries: Tens competència amb les armes {@skill Acrobatics} skill.

entries.name: Swift Stride
entries: Your walking speed increases by 5 feet.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifted, your walking speed increases by 5 feet. Additionally, you can move up to 10 feet as a reaction when an enemy ends its turn within 5 feet of you. This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

entries.name: Natural Tracker
entries: Tens competència amb les armes {@skill Survival} skill.

entries.name: Mark the Scent
entries: Com a acció bonus, you can mark una criatura que puguis veure a 10 peus d'abast. Until the end of your next long rest, el teu bonus de competència is doubled for any ability check you make to find the marked creature, and you always know the location of that creature if it is within 60 feet of you. You can't use this trait again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifted, tens avantatge a Saviesa checks.

entries.name: Edat
entries: Hybrids begin their lives as adult humans, elfs, or vedalken. They age at a slightly accelerated rate, so their maximum life spans are probably reduced somewhat. The Guardian Project has not been operating long enough to observe the full effect of this phenomenon.

entries.name: Alineament
entries: Most hybrids share the generally neutral outlook of the Simic Combine. They are more interested in scientific research and the standing of their guild than in moral or ethical questions. Those who leave the Combine, however, often do so because their philosophical outlook and alignment are more in line with a different guild's.

entries.name: Tamany
entries: El teu tamany és Mitjà, within the normal range of your humanoid base race.

entries.name: Visió de Foscor
entries: Pots veure-hi en llum tènue a 60 peus d'abast com si fos llum forta, i a la foscor com si fos llum tènue. No pots veure colors a la foscor, només blancs, negres, i grisos.

entries.name: Idiomes
entries: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Comú i your choice of Èlfic or Vedalken.

entries.name: Animal Enhancement
entries: Your body has been altered to incorporate certain animal characteristics. You choose one animal enhancement now and a second enhancement at 5th level.
At 1st level, choose one of the following options:

items.name: Manta Glide
items.entry: You have ray-like fins that you can use as wings to slow your fall or allow you to glide. When you fall and aren't {@condition incapacitat}, you can subtract up to 100 feet from the fall when calculating falling damage, and you can move up to 2 feet horizontally for every 1 foot you descend.

items.name: Nimble Climber
items.entry: Obténs una velocitat d'escalada equivalent a la teva velocitat de caminar.

items.name: Underwater Adaptation
items.entry: You can breathe air and water, and you have a swimming speed equal to your walking speed.

entries: At 5th level, your body evolves further, developing new characteristics. Choose one of the options you didn't take at 1st level, or one of the following options:

items.name: Grappling Appendage
items.entry: You have two special appendages growing alongside your arms. Choose whether they're both claws or tentacles. Com a acció, you can use one of them to try to grapple a creature. Each one is also a arma natural, which you can use to make an atac desarmat. If you hit with it, the target takes dany contundent equal to {@dice 1d6} + el teu modificador de Força, instead of the dany contundent normal for an atac desarmat. Immediately after hitting, you can try to grapple the target as a bonus action. These appendages can't precisely manipulate anything and can't wield weapons, magic items, or other specialized equipment.

items.name: Carapace
items.entry: Your skin in places is covered by a thick shell. You gain a +1 bonus to AC when you're not wearing heavy armor.

items.name: Acid Spit
items.entry: Com a acció, you can spray acid from glands in your mouth, targeting one creature or object que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast. The target takes {@dice 2d10} de dany d'àcid unless it succeeds on a Destresa saving throw de CD 8 + el teu modificador de Constitució + el teu bonus de competència. This damage increases by {@dice 1d10} quan arribes a nivell 11 ({@dice 3d10}) and 17th level ({@dice 4d10}). You can use this trait tants cops com el your Constitució modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses of it when you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Edat
entries: Hybrids begin their lives as adult humans, elfs, or vedalken. They exhibit signs of slightly accelerated aging, so their maximum lifespans are probably reduced somewhat, but the Guardian Project has not been operating long enough to observe the full effect of this phenomenon.

entries.name: Alineament
entries: Most hybrids share the generally neutral outlook of the Simic Combine as a whole. They are more interested in scientific research and the standing of their guild than in moral or ethical questions. However, those who leave the Combine often do so because their philosophical outlook and alignment are more in line with a different guild's.

entries.name: Tamany
entries: El teu tamany és Mitjà, within the normal range of your humanoid base race.

entries.name: Visió de Foscor
entries: Pots veure-hi en llum tènue a 60 peus d'abast com si fos llum forta, i a la foscor com si fos llum tènue. No pots veure colors a la foscor, només blancs, negres, i grisos.

At 1st level, choose one of the following options:

items.name: Manta Glide
items.entry: Your ray-like wings can slow your fall and allow you to glide. When you fall and aren't {@condition incapacitat}, you can subtract up to 100 feet from the fall when calculating falling damage, and you can move up to 2 feet horizontally for every 1 foot you descend.

items.name: Nimble Climber
items.entry: Obténs una velocitat d'escalada equivalent a la teva velocitat de caminar.

items.name: Underwater Adaptation
items.entry: You can breathe air and water, and you have a swimming speed equal to your walking speed.

entries: At 5th level, choose one of the following options, or choose one of the options you didn't take at 1st level:

items.name: Grappling Appendage
items.entry: You have two special appendages growing alongside your arms. Choose whether they're both claws or tentacles. Each of these appendages is a arma natural, which you can use to make atacs desarmats. If you hit with it, the target takes dany contundent equal to {@dice 1d6} + el teu modificador de Força, instead of the dany contundent normal for an atac desarmat. Immediately after hitting, you can try to grapple the target as a bonus action. These appendages can't precisely manipulate anything and can't wield weapons, magic items, or other specialized equipment.

items.name: Carapace
items.entry: Your skin in places is covered by a thick shell. You gain a +1 bonus to AC when you're not wearing heavy armor.

items.name: Acid Spit
items.entry: Com a acció, you can spray a stream of acid from glands in your mouth, targeting one creature or object que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast. The target takes {@dice 2d10} de dany d'àcid unless it succeeds on a Destresa saving throw de CD 8 + el teu modificador de Constitució + el teu bonus de competència. This damage increases by {@dice 1d10} quan arribes a nivell 11 ({@dice 3d10}) and 17th level ({@dice 4d10}).

entries.name: Idiomes
entries: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Comú i Èlfic.

entries.name: Alineament
entries: Most sirens lean toward chaotic alignment, cherishing the freedom and independence that comes from joining a pirate crew.

entries.name: Tamany
entries: Sirens stand about 5 to 6 feet tall, but their bodies are slender and their bones partially hollow to facilitate their flight. El teu tamany és Mitjà.

entries.name: Siren's Song
entries: Coneixes el truc {@spell amistar} and can cast it without material components.

entries.name: Vol
entries: Tens una velocitat de vol de 30 peus. No pots emprar la velocitat de vol si duus armadura intermitja o pesada. (Si la teva campanya fa servir la regla variant de càrrega, no pots volar si vas carregat/da/i.)

entries.name: Idiomes
entries: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Comú (if it exists in your campaign) and Siren.

entries.name: Brittle Bones
entries: You are vulnerable to dany contundent.

entries.name: Naturalesa No-Morta
entries: Ets immune al dany de verí and {@condition exhaust}, and you can't be {@condition emmetzinat}. You don't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

entries.name: Visió de Foscor
entries: Pots veure-hi en llum tènue a 60 peus d'abast com si fos llum forta, i a la foscor com si fos llum tènue. No pots veure colors a la foscor, només blancs, negres, i grisos.

entries.name: Idiomes
entries: No pots parlar, però comprèns els idiomes que comprenies en vida.

entries.name: Edat
entries: Tabaxi have lifespans equivalent to humans.

entries.name: Alineament
entries: Tabaxi tend toward chaotic alignments, as they let impulse and fancy guide their decisions. They are rarely evil, with most of them driven by curiosity rather than greed or other dark impulses.

entries.name: Tamany
entries: Tabaxi are taller on average than humans and relatively slender. El teu tamany és Mitjà.

entries.name: Visió de Foscor
entries: You have a cat's keen senses, especially in the dark. Pots veure-hi en llum tènue a 60 peus d'abast com si fos llum forta, i a la foscor com si fos llum tènue. No pots veure colors a la foscor, només blancs, negres, i grisos.

entries.name: Feline Agility
entries: Your reflexes and agility allow you to move with a burst of speed. When you move on your turn in combat, you can double your speed until the end of the turn. Un cop empris aquest tret, you can't use it again until you move 0 feet on one of your turns.

entries.name: Cat's Claws
entries: Because of your claws, you have a climbing speed of 20 feet. In addition, your claws són armes naturals que es consideren atacs desarmats. Si impactes així, fas {dice 1d4} + el teu modificador de Força de dany tallant i no el dany normal d'un atac desarmat.

entries.name: Cat's Talents
entries: Tens competència en {@skill Perception} i en {@skill Stealth}.

entries.name: Idiomes
entries: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Comú i un idioma més (escull).

entries.name: Edat
entries: Els Tieflings maduren al mateix ritme que els humans però viuen alguns anys més.

entries.name: Alineament
entries: Tieflings might not have an innate tendency toward evil, but many of them end up there. Evil or not, an independent nature inclines many tieflings toward a chaotic alignment.

entries.name: Tamany
entries: Tieflings are about the same size and build as humans. El teu tamany és Mitjà.

entries.name: Visió de Foscor
entries: Thanks to your infernal heritage, tens una visió superior sota condicions de foscor o de poca llum. Pots veure-hi en llum tènue a 60 peus d'abast com si fos llum forta, i a la foscor com si fos llum tènue. No pots veure colors a la foscor, només blancs, negres, i grisos.

entries.name: Hellish Resistència
entries: Tens resistència al dany fire.

entries.name: Llegat Infernal
entries: Coneixes el truc {@spell taumatúrgia}. Quan arribis al nivell 3, podràs llançar el conjur {@spell venjança dels inferns} spell as a 2nd-level spell; you must finish a long rest in order to cast the spell again using this trait. Quan arribis al nivell 5, podràs llançar el conjur {@spell darkness} spell; you must finish a long rest in order to cast the spell again using this trait. Per aquests conjurs, la teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma.

entries.name: Idiomes
entries: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Comú i Infernal.

entries.name: Abyssal Arcana
entries: Each time you finish a long rest, you gain the ability to cast cantrips and spells randomly determined from a short list. At 1st level, you can cast a cantrip. Quan arribes a nivell 3, you can also cast a 1st-level spell. At 5th level, you can cast a 2nd-level spell.

You can cast a spell gained from this trait only once until you complete your next long rest. You can cast a cantrip gained from this trait at will, as normal. For 1st-level spells whose effect changes if cast using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you cast the spell as if using a 2nd-level slot. Spells of 2nd level are cast as if using a 2nd-level slot

At the end of each long rest, you lose the cantrips and spells previously granted by this feature, even if you did not cast them. You replace those cantrips and spells by rolling for new ones on the Abyssal Arcana Spells table. Roll separately for each cantrip and spell. If you roll the same spell or cantrip you gained at the end of your previous long rest, roll again until you get a different result.

entries.name: Abyssal Fortitude
entries: Your punts de vida màxims increases by half your level (minimum 1).

entries.name: Idiomes
entries: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Comú i Abyssal.

entries.name: Legacy of Maladomini
entries: Coneixes el truc {@spell taumatúrgia}. Quan arribes a nivell 3 pots llançar el conjur {@spell raig d'arcada} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Quan arribes al nivell 5, pots llançar el conjur {@spell corona de bogeria} amb aquest tret un cop cada Descans Llarg. Per aquests conjurs, la teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma.

Quan arribes al nivell 5, pots llançar el conjur {@spell invisibility} amb aquest tret un cop cada Descans Llarg. Per aquests conjurs, la teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma.

entries.name: Legacy of Stygia
entries: Coneixes el truc {@spell ray of frost}. Quan arribes a nivell 3 pots llançar el conjur {@spell armadura d'Àgathys} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Quan arribes al nivell 5, pots llançar el conjur {@spell darkness} amb aquest tret un cop cada Descans Llarg. Per aquests conjurs, la teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma.

entries: Coneixes el truc {@spell ray of frost}. Quan arribes a nivell 3 pots llançar el conjur {@spell armadura d'Àgathys} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Quan arribes al nivell 5, pots llançar el conjur {@spell darkness} amb aquest tret un cop cada Descans Llarg. Per aquests conjurs, la teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma.

entries: Coneixes el truc {@spell mà de mag}. Quan arribes a nivell 3 pots llançar el conjur {@spell Disc Flotant d'en Tenser} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a short or long rest. Quan arribes a nivell 5 pots llançar el conjur {@spell pany arcà} spell once with this trait, requiring no material component, and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Per aquests conjurs, la teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma.

Quan arribes a nivell 3 pots llançar el conjur {@spell Disc Flotant d'en Tenser} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a short or long rest. Quan arribes a nivell 5 pots llançar el conjur {@spell pany arcà} spell once with this trait, requiring no material component, and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Per aquests conjurs, la teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma.

entries: Coneixes el truc {@spell mà de mag}. Quan arribes a nivell 3 pots llançar el conjur {@spell mans ardents} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Quan arribes al nivell 5, pots llançar el conjur {@spell espasa de foc} amb aquest tret un cop cada Descans Llarg. Per aquests conjurs, la teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma.

entries.name: Legacy of Cania
entries: Coneixes el truc {@spell mà de mag}. Quan arribes a nivell 3 pots llançar el conjur {@spell missil màgic} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Quan arribes al nivell 5, pots llançar el conjur {@spell tirarany} amb aquest tret un cop cada Descans Llarg. Per aquests conjurs, la teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma.

entries.name: Aparença
entries: Your tiefling might not look like other tieflings. Rather than having the physical characteristics described in the Player's Handbook, choose {@dice 1d4+1} of the following features: small horns; fangs or sharp teeth; a forked tongue; catlike eyes; six fingers on each hand; goatlike legs; cloven hoofs; a forked tail; leathery or scaly skin; red or dark blue skin; cast no shadow or reflection; exude a smell of brimstone.

entries.name: Devil's Tongue
entries: Coneixes el truc {@spell mofa i escarni}. When your reach 3rd level, pots llançar el conjur {@spell fascinar persona} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait. Quan arribes a nivell 5 pots llançar el conjur {@spell captivar} spell once with this trait. You must finish a long rest to cast these spells once again with this trait. Carisma is la teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs for them. This trait replaces the Llegat Infernal trait.

entries.name: Aparença
entries: Your tiefling might not look like other tieflings. Rather than having the physical characteristics described in the Player's Handbook, choose {@dice 1d4+1} of the following features: small horns; fangs or sharp teeth; a forked tongue; catlike eyes; six fingers on each hand; goatlike legs; cloven hoofs; a forked tail; leathery or scaly skin; red or dark blue skin; cast no shadow or reflection; exude a smell of brimstone.

entries.name: Hellfire
entries: Coneixes el truc {@spell taumatúrgia}. Quan arribis al nivell 3, podràs llançar el conjur {@spell mans ardents} spell once per day as a 2nd-level spell; you must finish a long rest in order to cast the spell again using this trait. Quan arribis al nivell 5, podràs llançar el conjur {@spell darkness} spell; you must finish a long rest in order to cast the spell again using this trait. Per aquests conjurs, la teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma.

entries.name: Aparença
entries: Your tiefling might not look like other tieflings. Rather than having the physical characteristics described in the Player's Handbook, choose {@dice 1d4+1} of the following features: small horns; fangs or sharp teeth; a forked tongue; catlike eyes; six fingers on each hand; goatlike legs; cloven hoofs; a forked tail; leathery or scaly skin; red or dark blue skin; cast no shadow or reflection; exude a smell of brimstone.

entries.name: Aparença
entries: Your tiefling might not look like other tieflings. Rather than having the physical characteristics described in the Player's Handbook, choose {@dice 1d4+1} of the following features: small horns; fangs or sharp teeth; a forked tongue; catlike eyes; six fingers on each hand; goatlike legs; cloven hoofs; a forked tail; leathery or scaly skin; red or dark blue skin; cast no shadow or reflection; exude a smell of brimstone.

entries.name: Winged
entries: You have bat-like wings sprouting from your shoulder blades. Tens una velocitat de vol de 30 peus while you aren't wearing heavy armor.

entries.name: Legacy of Avernus
entries: Coneixes el truc {@spell taumatúrgia}. Quan arribes a nivell 3 pots llançar el conjur {@spell càstig abrasador} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Quan arribes al nivell 5, pots llançar el conjur {@spell càstig marcador} amb aquest tret un cop cada Descans Llarg. Per aquests conjurs, la teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma.

entries.name: Legacy of Avernus
entries: Coneixes el truc {@spell taumatúrgia}. Quan arribes a nivell 3 pots llançar el conjur {@spell càstig abrasador} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Quan arribes al nivell 5, pots llançar el conjur {@spell càstig marcador} amb aquest tret un cop cada Descans Llarg. Per aquests conjurs, la teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma.
{@note The Tortle Package is considered part of Xanathar's Guide to Everything for Adventurers League character creation.}

entries.name: Edat
entries: Young tortles crawl for a few weeks after birth before learning to walk on two legs. They reach adulthood by the age of 15 and live an average of 50 years.

entries.name: Alineament
entries: Tortles tend to lead orderly, ritualistic lives. They develop customs and routines, becoming more set in their ways as they age. Most are lawful good. A few can be selfish and greedy, tending more toward evil, but it's unusual for a tortle to shuck off order in favor of chaos.

entries.name: Tamany
entries: Tortle adults stand 5 to 6 feet tall and average 450 pounds. Their shells account for roughly one-third of their weight. El teu tamany és Mitjà

entries.name: Urpes
entries: Your claws són armes naturals que es consideren atacs desarmats. If you hit with them, you deal slashing damage equal to {@dice 1d4} + el teu modificador de Força, instead of dany contundent normal for an atac desarmat.

entries.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: You can hold your breath for up to 1 hour at a time. Tortles aren't natural swimmers, but they can remain underwater for some time before needing to come up for air.

entries.name: Armadura Natural
entries: Due to your shell and the shape of your body, you are ill-suited to wearing armor. Your shell provides ample protection, however; it gives you a base AC of 17 (your Destresa modifier doesn't affect this number). You gain no benefit from wearing armor, but if you are using a shield, you can apply the shield's bonus as normal.

entries.name: Defensa Closca
entries: You can withdraw into your shell as an action. Until you emerge, you gain a +4 bonus to AC, and tens avantatge a Força and Constitució saving throws. While in your shell, you are {@condition enderrocat}, your speed is 0 and can't increase, you have disadvantage on Destresa saving throws, you can't take reactions, and the only action you can take is a bonus action to emerge from your shell.

entries.name: Survival Instinct
entries: Tens competència en l'habilitat {@skill Survival}. Tortles have finely honed survival instincts.

entries.name: Idiomes
entries: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Aquan and Comú.

items.name: Alineament
entries: Tritons tend toward neutrality. Their culture encourages them to be mindful of life's currents, knowing when to harness fate's tides and when to flow along with them.

entries.name: Edat
entries: Tritons reach maturity around age 15 and can live up to 200 years.

entries.name: Alineament
entries: Tritons tend toward lawful good. As guardians of the darkest reaches of the sea, their culture pushes them toward order and benevolence.

entries.name: Tamany
entries: Tritons are slightly shorter than humans, averaging about 5 feet tall. El teu tamany és Mitjà.

entries.name: Velocitat de Natació
entries: Tens una velocitat de natació de 30 peus.

entries.name: Amfibi
entries: Pots respirar aire i a l'aigua

entries.name: Control Air and Water
entries: A mar-nascut, you can call on the magic of elemental air and water. You can cast {@spell núvol de boira} with this trait. Començant al nivell 3, you can cast {@spell ràfega de vent} with it, and començant al nivell 5, you can also cast {@spell Paret d'Aigua|xge} with it. Once you cast a spell with this trait, you can't cast that spell with it again until you finish a long rest. Per aquests conjurs, la teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma.

entries.name: Visió de Foscor
entries: Pots veure-hi en llum tènue a 60 peus d'abast com si fos llum forta i a la foscor com si fos llum tènue. No pots veure colors a la foscor, només blancs, negres, i grisos.

entries.name: Emissari del Mar
entries: Aquatic beasts have an extraordinary affinity with your people. You can communicate simple ideas with beasts that can breathe water. They can understand the meaning of your words, though you have no special ability to understand them in return.

entries.name: Guardians of the Depths
entries: Adapted to even the most extreme ocean depths, tens resistència al dany cold.

entries.name: Idiomes
entries: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Comú i Primordial.

entries.name: Pell Camaleònica
entries: Tens avantatge a tirades de Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) made to hide.

entries.name: Stench
entries: Any creature other than a troglodyte that starts its turn within 5 ft. of you must succeed on a DC 12 Constitució saving throw or be {@condition emmetzinat} until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all troglodytes for 1 hour.

entries.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, you have disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

entries.name: Armadura Natural
entries: Your thick hide grants you a +1 bonus to Armor Class.

entries.name: Visió de Foscor
entries: Pots veure-hi en llum tènue a 60 peus d'abast com si fos llum forta, i a la foscor com si fos llum tènue. No pots veure colors a la foscor, només blancs, negres, i grisos.

entries.name: Idiomes
entries: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Troglodyte.

entries.name: Edat
entries: Vampires don't mature and age in the same way that other races do.

entries.name: Alineament
entries: Vampires might not have an innate tendency toward evil, but many of them end up there. Evil or not, their strict hierarchies incline them toward a lawful alignment.

entries.name: Tamany
entries: Vampires are the same size and build as humans. El teu tamany és Mitjà.

entries.name: Bloodthirst
entries: You can drain blood and life energy from a willing creature, or one that is {@condition grappled} by you, {@condition incapacitat}, o {@condition restrained}. Make a melee attack against the target. If you hit, you deal 1 piercing damage and {@dice 1d6} de dany necròtic. Els punts de vida màxims de l'objectiu es redueixen tant com dany necròtic hagi rebut, and you regain hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces it's punts de vida màxims to 0.

entries.name: Feast of Blood
entries: When you drain blood with your Bloodthirst ability, you experience a surge of vitality. Your speed increases by 10 feet, and you gain advantage on Força and Destresa checks and saving throws durant 1 minut.

entries.name: Vampiric Resistència
entries: Tens resistència al dany necròtic.

entries.name: Visió de Foscor
entries: Pots veure-hi en llum tènue a 60 peus d'abast com si fos llum forta, i a la foscor com si fos llum tènue. No pots veure colors a la foscor, només blancs, negres, i grisos.

entries.name: Idiomes
entries: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Comú (if it exists in your campaign) and Vampire.

entries.name: Edat
entries: Vampires don't mature and age in the same way that other races do. Every living vampire is either a bloodchief, infected by Ulamog's influence in the distant reaches of history, or was spawned by a bloodchief from a living human. Most vampires are thus very old, but few have any memory of their earliest years.

entries.name: Alineament
entries: Vampires have no innate tendency toward evil, but consuming the life energy of other creatures often pushes them to that end. Regardless of their moral bent, the strict hierarchies of their bloodchiefs inclines them toward a lawful alignment.

entries.name: Tamany
entries: Vampires are about the same size and build as humans. El teu tamany és Mitjà.

entries.name: Fam de Sang
entries: You can drain blood and life energy from a willing creature, or one that is {@condition grappled} by you, {@condition incapacitat}, o {@condition restrained}. Make a melee attack against the target. If you hit, you deal 1 piercing damage and {@dice 1d6} de dany necròtic. Els punts de vida màxims de l'objectiu es redueixen tant com dany necròtic hagi rebut, and you regain hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. L'objectiu mor si aquest efecte li redueix els punts de vida màxim a 0. A humanoid killed in this way becomes a {@creature zombie||null}.

entries.name: Visió de Foscor
entries: Gràcies a la teva herència tens una visió superior estan en llocs foscos o poc il·luminats. Pots veure-hi en llum tènue a 60 peus d'abast com si fos llum forta, i a la foscor com si fos llum tènue. No pots veure colors a la foscor, només blancs, negres, i grisos.

entries.name: Idiomes
entries: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Comú i Vampire.

entries.name: Vampiric Resistència
entries: Tens resistència al dany necròtic.

entries.name: Edat
entries: Vedalken mature slower than humans do, reaching maturity around age 40. Their life span is typically 350 years, with some living to the age of 500.

entries.name: Alineament
entries: Vedalken are usually lawful and non-evil.

entries.name: Tamany
entries: Tall and slender, Vedalken stand 6 to 6½ feet tall on average and usually weigh less than 200 pounds. El teu tamany és Mitjà.

entries.name: Vedalken Dispassion
entries: Tens avantatge a salvar per Intel·ligència, Saviesa, i Carisma.

entries.name: Precisió Incansable
entries: You are proficient in one of the following skills of your choice: {@skill Arcana}, {@skill History}, {@skill Investigation}, {@skill Medicine}, {@skill Performance}, o {@skill Sleight of Hand}.  You are also proficient with one {@book tool|phb|5|tools} of your choice.
Whenever you make an ability check with the chosen skill or tool, roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the check's total.

entries.name: Partially Amfibi
entries: By absorbing oxygen through your skin, you can breathe underwater for up to 1 hour. Once you've reached that limit, you can't use this trait again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Idiomes
entries: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Comú, Vedalken, and one other language of your choice.

entries.name: Edat
entries: Vedalken mature at the same rate humans do, and most are expected to settle down into an adult life by around age 40. They can live 350 to almost 500 years.

entries.name: Alineament
entries: Vedalken are most often lawful and rarely evil.

entries.name: Tamany
entries: Vedalken are taller than humans but more slender. They average 6 to 6½ feet tall, but usually weigh less than 200 pounds. El teu tamany és Mitjà.

entries.name: Idiomes
entries: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Comú i Vedalken. The Vedalken language is renowned for its technical treatises and its catalogs of knowledge about the natural world and the aether that pervades it.

entries.name: Vedalken Cunning
entries: Tens avantatge a salvar per Intel·ligència, Saviesa, i Carisma against magic.

entries.name: Aether Lore
entries: Quan fas una tirada d'Intel·ligència ({@skill Història}) related to magic items or aether-powered technological devices, you can add twice el teu bonus de competència, instead of any proficiency bonus you normally apply.

entries.name: Edat
entries: Vedalken mature at the same rate humans do, and most are expected to settle down into an adult life by around age 40. They can live 350 to almost 500 years.

entries.name: Alineament
entries: Vedalken are most often lawful and rarely evil.

entries.name: Tamany
entries: Vedalken are taller than humans but more slender. They average 6 to 6½ feet tall, but usually weigh less than 200 pounds. El teu tamany és Mitjà.

entries.name: Idiomes
entries: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Comú.

entries.name: Vedalken Dispassion
entries: Tens avantatge a salvar per Intel·ligència, Saviesa, i Carisma.

entries.name: Precisió Incansable
entries: You are proficient in one of the following skills of your choice: {@skill Arcana}, {@skill History}, {@skill Investigation}, {@skill Medicine}, {@skill Performance}, o {@skill Sleight of Hand}. You are also proficient with one {@book tool|phb|5|tools} of your choice.
Whenever you make an ability check with the chosen skill or tool, roll a {@dice d4}, and add the number rolled to the check's total.

entries.name: Edat
entries: Verdan reach adulthood at around the age of 24, and it is thought that they might live to nearly 200 years old. However, because no verdan has died of old age since the race's initial creation, their upper age limits remain subject to speculation.

entries.name: Alineament
entries: Verdan are generally good, although their absence of racial identity and shared history can sometimes see individual verdan become untethered from any moral or ethical framework.

entries.name: Tamany
entries: Verdan start out similar in size to the goblins they were created from, ranging from 3 to 4 feet in height. But at some point after reaching maturity, each verdan undergoes a sudden growth spurt of 2 feet or more. At 1st level, you are a Small creature. Quan arribes a nivell 5, you become a Medium creature.

entries.name: Black Blood Healing
entries: The black blood that is a sign of your people's connection to That-Which-Endures boosts your natural healing. When you roll a 1 or 2 on any Hit Die you spend at the end of a short rest, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

entries.name: Telepatia Limitada
entries: Pots parlar telepàticament amb qualsevol criatura que puguis veure a 30 peus d'abast. You don't need to share a language with the creature for it to understand your telepathy, but it must be able to understand at least one language. This process of communication is slow and limited, allowing you to transmit and receive only simple ideas and straightforward concepts.

entries.name: Persuasive
entries: Your people's lack of history makes you trustworthy and humble. Tens competència en {@skill Persuasion}.

entries.name: Telepathic Insight
entries: Your mind's connection to the world around you strengthens your will. Tens avantatge a salvar per Saviesa i Carisma.

entries.name: Idioma
entries: You speak, read, and write Comú, Goblin, i un idioma més (escull). This language typically has some connection to one of the areas or cultures that has been part of your life.

entries.name: Edat
entries: Viashino mature quickly, reaching adulthood in their early teens. They live violent lives and rarely die of old age, but they would rarely live past 60 anyway.

entries.name: Alineament
entries: Viashino strongly tend toward chaotic alignments. They have no particular inclination toward good or evil.

entries.name: Tamany
entries: Viashino are about as tall as humans, but they have lithe, wiry frames. El teu tamany és Mitjà.

entries.name: Mossegada
entries: Els teus ullals is a arma natural, which you can use to make atacs desarmats. Si impactes així, fas {dice 1d4} + el teu modificador de Força de dany perforant i no el dany normal d'un atac desarmat.

entries.name: Lashing Tail
entries: Your semi-prehensile tail is tipped with a bony blade. Immediately after a creature within 5 feet of you deals damage to you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to make an atac desarmat against that creature with your tail. If you hit, you deal slashing damage equal to {@dice 1d4} + el teu modificador de Força, instead of the dany contundent normal for an atac desarmat.

entries.name: Wiry Frame
entries: You gain proficiency in the {@skill Acrobatics} or the {@skill Stealth} skill (your choice).

entries.name: Idiomes
entries: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Comú i Draconic.

entries.name: Edat
entries: A typical guerraforjat is between two and thirty years old. The maximum guerraforjat lifespan remains a mystery; so far, guerraforjat have shown no signs of deterioration due to age. You are immune to magical aging effects.

entries.name: Alineament
entries: Most guerraforjat take comfort in order and discipline, tending toward law and neutrality. But some have absorbed the morality, or lack thereof, of the beings with which they served.

entries.name: Tamany
entries: El teu tamany és Mitjà.

entries.name: Resiliència Planificada
entries: You were created to have remarkable fortitude, represented by the following benefits:

items: Tens avantatge a saving throws against being {@condition emmetzinat}, and tens resistència al dany poison.
You don't need to eat, drink, or breathe.
You are immune to disease.
You don't need to sleep, and you no pot ésser adormit màgicament.

entries.name: Descans del Sentinella
entries: When you take a long rest, you must spend at least six hours in an inactive, motionless state, rather than sleeping. In this state, you appear inert, but it doesn't render you {@condition inconscient}, and you can see and hear as normal.

entries.name: Protecció Integrada
entries: Your body has built-in defensive layers, which can be enhanced with armor:

items: You gain a +1 bonus to Armor Class.

You can don only armor with which you have proficiency. To don armor other than a shield, you must incorporate it into your body over the course of 1 hour, during which you remain in contact with the armor. To doff armor, you must spend 1 hour removing it. You can rest while donning or doffing armor in this way.
While you live, the armor incorporated into your body can't be removed against your will.

entries.name: Disseny Especialitzat
entries: You gain one skill proficiency and one tool proficiency of your choice.

entries.name: Idiomes
entries: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Comú i un idioma més (escull).

entries.name: Tamany
entries: Guerraforjat are generally broader and heavier than humans. El teu tamany és Mitjà

entries.name: Plaques Compostes
entries: Your construction incorporates wood and metal, granting you a +1 bonus to Armor Class.

entries.name: Living Construct
entries: Even though you were constructed, you are a living creature. You are immune to disease. You do not need to eat or breathe, but you can ingest food and drink if you wish.

Instead of sleeping, you enter an inactive state for 4 hours each day. You do not dream in this state; you are fully aware of your surroundings and notice approaching enemies and other events as normal.

entries.name: Idiomes
entries: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Comú i un idioma més (escull).

entries.name: Edat
entries: A typical guerraforjat is between two and thirty years old. The maximum lifespan of the guerraforjat remains a mystery; so far, guerraforjat have shown no signs of deterioration due to age.

entries.name: Alineament
entries: Most guerraforjat take comfort in order and discipline, tending toward law and neutrality, but some have absorbed the morality—or lack thereof—of the beings they served with.

entries.name: Tamany
entries: El teu tamany és Mitjà. Most guerraforjat stand between 5 and 6½ feet tall. Build is affected by your subrace.

entries.name: Guerraforjat Resilience
entries: You were created to have remarkable fortitude, represented by the following benefits:

items: Tens avantatge a saving throws against being {@condition emmetzinat}, and tens resistència al dany poison.
You are immune to disease.
You don't need to eat, drink, or breathe.
You don't need to sleep and don't suffer the effects of {@condition exhaust} due to lack of rest, and you no pot ésser adormit màgicament.

entries.name: Descans del Sentinella
entries: When you take a long rest, you must spend at least six hours of it in an inactive, motionless state, rather than sleeping. In this state, you appear inert, but it doesn't render you {@condition inconscient}, and you can see and hear as normal.

entries.name: Protecció Integrada
entries: Your body has built-in protective layers, which determine your Armor Class. You gain no benefit from wearing armor, but if you are using a shield, you apply its bonus as normal.
You can alter your body to enter different defensive modes; each time you finish a long rest, choose one mode to adopt from the Protecció Integrada table, provided you meet the mode's prerequisite.

entries.caption: Protecció Integrada
rows: 11 + el teu modificador de Destresa (add proficiency bonus if proficient with light armor)
13 + el teu modificador de Destresa (maximum of 2) + el teu bonus de competència
16 + el teu bonus de competència; disadvantage on Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) checks

entries.name: Idiomes
entries: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Comú.

entries.name: Disseny Especialitzat
entries: You gain one skill proficiency of your choice, one {@book tool|phb|5|tools} proficiency of your choice, and fluency in one language of your choice.

entries.name: Integrated Tool
entries: Choose one tool you're proficient with. This tool is integrated into your body, and you double el teu bonus de competència for any ability checks you make with it. You must have your hands free to use this integrated tool.

entries.name: Envoys: Disseny Especialitzat
entries: As the name implies, most guerraforjat were built to fight in the Last War. The vast majority of guerraforjat are juggernauts or skirmishers—soldiers and scouts who fought under the banner of one of the Five Nations. Guerraforjat envoys, however, were designed to perform other functions. As an envoy, you have a skill, a tool proficiency, and a tool that's part of your body. When you make an envoy character, consider the following questions: What is your purpose? How does your skill and your tool reflect that purpose? What form does your integrated tool take? If you have embedded thieves' tools, for instance, are your fingers actually lockpicks, or can you produce keys from various parts of your body? The following characters are examples of guerraforjat with integrated tools.
{@b Lute} is a bard with the entertainer background; his namesake instrument folds out of his left arm.
{@b Compass Rose} is a wizard with the outlander background. A keen explorer, she uses her built-in {@item cartographer's tools|phb} to record the paths she travels.

{@b Masque} is an infiltrator. A rogue with the charlatan background and an integrated {@item disguise Kit|phb}, she was built to blend in and assassinate. Cannith built six guerraforjat of her design, and Masque has vowed to hunt down and destroy the other five.

In developing your integrated tool, remember that you must have your hands free to use it. Masque, the infiltrator mentioned above, doesn't shapeshift like a changeling; she has to manually adjust her appearance.

entries.name: Iron Fists
entries: When you hit with an atac desarmat, you can deal {@dice 1d4} + el teu modificador de Força dany contundent, instead of the normal damage for an atac desarmat.

entries.name: Fesonomia Poderosa
entries: Et consideres un tamany més gran quan determines la capacitat de càrrega i el pes que pots empènyer, estibar, o aixecar.

entries.name: Swift
entries: Your walking speed increases by 5 feet.

entries.name: Light Step
entries: When you are traveling alone for an extended period of time (one hour or more), you can move stealthily at a normal pace. (See {@book chapter 8|PHB|8|Travel Pace} of the Player's Handbook for information about travel pace.)

entries.name: Edat
entries: Els Purebloods maduren al mateix ritme que els humans and have lifespans similar in length to theirs.

entries.name: Alineament
entries: Purebloods are devoid of emotion and see others as tools to manipulate. They care little for law or chaos and are typically neutral evil.

entries.name: Tamany
entries: Purebloods match humans in average size and weight. El teu tamany és Mitjà.

entries.name: Visió de Foscor
entries: Pots veure-hi en llum tènue a 60 peus d'abast com si fos llum forta, i a la foscor com si fos llum tènue. No pots veure colors a la foscor, només blancs, negres, i grisos.

entries.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
entries: Coneixes el truc {@spell esprai de verí}. You can cast {@spell amistat animal} an unlimited number of times with this trait, but you can target only snakes with it. Començant al nivell 3, you can also cast {@spell suggestió} with this trait. Once you cast it, no pots tornar a emprar-lo fins que acabis un Descans Llarg. Per aquests conjurs, la teva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma.

entries.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Tens avantatge a saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Immunitat a Metzines
entries: Ets immune al dany de verí and the {@condition emmetzinat} condition.

entries.name: Idiomes
entries: Pots parlar, llegir, i escriure Comú, Abyssal, and Draconic.

entries.name: Resiliència No-morta
entries: If damage reduces you to 0 hit points, you ha de salvar per Constitució with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, you drop to 1 hit point instead.

entries.name: Naturalesa No-Morta
entries: Ets immune al dany de verí, and you can't be {@condition emmetzinat}. You don't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

entries.name: Visió de Foscor
entries: Pots veure-hi en llum tènue a 60 peus d'abast com si fos llum forta, i a la foscor com si fos llum tènue. No pots veure colors a la foscor, només blancs, negres, i grisos.

entries.name: Idiomes
entries: No pots parlar, però comprèns els idiomes que comprenies en vida.
